text: Using Amazon SageMaker Canvas
you can generate accurate machine learning predictions
without writing a single line of code.
You can even walk through building an ML model to predict
if a package is going to be late
depending on things like the weather.
Then take these learn skills
and apply them to your own business.
Oftentimes, when learning new AI ML services
you're forced to rely on external resources
and this fragmentation can lead to hundreds of wasted hours.
Amazon offers a threaded learning journey guiding you
from discovery to building your own use cases.
Develop your skills
by accessing simple interactive demos, videos, courses
and labs, and complete them all in under a day.
Start with our free five minute interactive demo
that helps you create your own machine learning model
and you don't need an AWS account to begin.
Throughout the demo, you're prompted to test your knowledge
ensuring you walk away
with a better understanding of Amazon's SageMaker Canvas.
After you can follow our guided lab to get
hands-on experience and dive even deeper
into the service, building a stronger foundation
of practical knowledge.
Finally, take a self-paced free course and see
how its features can be used for your specific industry.
Elevate your skills today
by learning how to use Amazon SageMaker Canvas.
